Name: YAPP2: Yet Another Pushing Puzzler
About the game: As the title says, it is yet another pushing puzzler, in which you have to push boxes onto specific locations. What makes this game unique is: It's 3d. FEATURES: Yet another 3d pushing puzzler. 6 worlds, each with a different theme. 54 handcrafted levels, full of 'Ah-ha' moments. And, awful artwork. About YAPP series YAPP2: Yet Another Pushing Puzzler is the second game of YAPP series. (A series of games with awful artwork, weird mechanisms, challenging puzzles, and the same initials.)
